description: An applicant applies to a **program** at an **organization**.

links.description: List existing organizations for this **user identity**.
links.title: List

title: Organization

___name.example: Demo University School of Public Health

___config_portal_identifier.description: Organization identifier that is specific to Config Portal.  May not be unique if `cas3` is `false`.

___cycle_name.description: Academic cycle of this organization, or `null` if not applicable.

___cas3.description: Whether or not this organization is using CAS3 (as opposed to the older CAS2, for example).

___association_name.description: Human-readable name of the association that this organization belongs to, or `null` if not applicable.
